text: The Swing is an oil painting by Jean Fragonard. It was painted between 1775 and 1780. The picture measures 215.9 x 185.5 cm (85 x 73 1/16 in.). It hangs in the National Gallery of Art, Washington, DC. == References == Category:1770s paintings Category:Paintings by Jean-Honor√© Fragonard Category:Paintings in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
title: The Swing (Fragonard, 1775-1780)
